message.content:
The most likely category for this paper is "Beauty" because it is a skincare product recommended by dermatologists and professional skin care specialists. 

The second likely category is "Health & Personal Care" because the product is targeted towards treating impure and problem skin.

The third likely category is "All Beauty" because the product is a specialty treatment mask for skincare.

The fourth likely category is "Luxury Beauty" because the product is recommended by professionals and is effective against various skin issues.

The fifth likely category is "Home & Kitchen" because the product can be used for minor skin irritations and ingrown hair razor bumps.

prompt:
Title: Gunilla Of Sweden Lerosett Mask
Content: Lerosett is recommended by dermatologists and professional skin care specialists worldwide. Based on a natural clay, Lerosett is a specialty treatment mask with active ingredients effective against impure, problem skin (blemishes, milia, Comedones, sebaeous cysts, congested skin, etc). Lerosett is also excellent for men and women to correct and prevent ingrown hair razor bumps, and minor skin irritations, Lerosett does not contain and dyes, synthetic or chemical additives.
